text: Earth First!: The Journal of Ecological Resistance, is the official publication of the Earth First! movement. First published as a newsletter in 1980, it has existed alongside the movement as a way to spread commonly held beliefs in Earth First! culture, such as biocentrism, deep ecology, and direct action. The magazine is also commonly known as the Earth First! Journal. ==References== ==External links== * Official website * Media library Category:Magazines established in 1980 Category:Magazines published in Oregon Category:Magazines published in Florida Category:Magazines published in Arizona Category:English-language magazines Category:Environmental magazines Category:Newsletters
title: Earth First! (magazine)
